name: BeatHit
description:
This game was made for the GeoJam (https://itch.io/jam/geojam), with two themes: Geometry and The other side. 

In this geometric rhythm game you try get high scores by dodging or intercepting bonuses and obstacles on two sides of vinyl records while keeping the beat of the music. Will you take risks for getting huge combos, or will you play safe and cash in early ?

Discover amazing AI generated music tracks of varied genres, build your combos, and chase that high score !

This is my second game ever, I hope you'll have as much fun playing it as I had making it. 

Music from https://evokemusic.ai/

Fonts from https://www.dafont.com/

Special thanks to my brother and best friend for playtesting the game and giving me  many great ideas, and to my girlfriend for saving me from terrible color choices.

Added a web version
